attributes.action: Stop the UK taking part in the Eurovision Song Contest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I propose that the Prime Minister should persuade the Eurovision fund in the UK to stop taking part in the Eurovision song contest because Terry Wogan is right;"It is not a song contest anymore".  This is a waste of public funds.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
